item.title: New Blogdown Website Launch!
item.description: Welcome to my brand new and shiny ‘Blogdown’ website! I have wanted to transfer from my wordpress.com blog for a while now and last weekend I finally did some investigating into my alternative options. I considered using a self hosted wordpress.org site which would allow me more control over my site but would fundamentally still use the same wordpress framework. Generally this seems to be what most regular bloggers use.
